name: Retrieve the Sales Messages for a Customer

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930077023000"

When I Retrieve the Read Only Sales Messages for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey |
| 0100000930077023000 |

Then I should receive the following message data
| custID | channelID | msgGroupID | segmentCode | text | productSubGroup | type | priority | channel | staffID | outcome | outcomeNote | nsc |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1037 |  | Have you upcoming plans that you may need funding for in the next few months? | Loan | Personal | 1 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1016 |  | Have you upcoming plans that you may need funding for in the next few months? | Loan | Personal | 2 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1012 |  | Have you upcoming plans that you may need funding for in the next few months? | Loan | Personal | 3 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1121 |  | Have you upcoming plans that you may need funding for in the next few months? | Loan | Generic | 4 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1042 |  | Do you need occasional access to additional funds? | Overdraft | Personal | 9 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1250 |  | Reduce your fees by using automated/self-service transactions | Current Account | Generic | 10 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1110 |  | We have the right kind of mortgage for you, whatever stage you're at. | Mortgage | Generic | 11 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1201 |  | Are you looking to save long-term for the future? | Investment | Generic | 13 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
| 0100000930077023000 | NV | 1211 |  | Can we help plan your income for your retirement? | Pension | Generic | 14 |  | 0 |  |  |  |
